channel.title: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?
channel.description:
![image|690x78](upload://992chd7thXkp6xuvIfYVrjaPaIz.png)
<hr>
Hello, I'm writing as a paying customer of Auxy who did not receive any new sounds in the previous month, September. According to the [subscription FAQ page](http://auxy.co/subfaq.html), the subscription includes "new sounds each month."
**Where are the sounds for September?**

item.title: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?
item.dc:creator: Hum4n01d
item.description:
Thank you to you and Goxenar for that. I started this thread to keep conversations about this separate from original thread about requests/predictions.

Read full topic
item.source: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?

item.title: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Lenberg responded to this in another topic…

New Subscription Sounds - September?

New sounds are coming very soon…

When we write “new sounds monthly”, we refer to a release pace that is around 30 days in between packs. Sometimes it will be shorter and sometimes a bit longer. I.e. not necessarily one pack every calendar month, but you should expect ca 12 packs in total over the course of a year.

For this pack, we had to get the app update out since the new sounds will use some new features in the engine.

I think that answers OPs question.

Read full topic
item.source: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?

item.title: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
A short announcement that the sound pack would be delayed due to the development of the update would have definitely cleared the air

Read full topic
item.source: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?

item.title: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?
item.dc:creator: Hum4n01d
item.description:
Produk:

Just because something doesn’t happen once doesn’t mean it wont happen every time after that. They spent September creating a magnificent Quality of Life update for you all.

Agreed, I totally get it. Just that there was no official announcement or agreement besides the FAQ which had information that is no longer accurate

Read full topic

Neurofunk came out in August

item.title: Subscription No Longer Includes Monthly Sounds?
item.dc:creator: Hum4n01d
item.description:
Goxenar:

New sounds are coming very soon…

When we write “new sounds monthly”, we refer to a release pace that is around 30 days in between packs. Sometimes it will be shorter and sometimes a bit longer. I.e. not necessarily one pack every calendar month, but you should expect ca 12 packs in total over the course of a year.

For this pack, we had to get the app update out since the new sounds will use some new features in the engine.

This should help a bit, I was also confused primarily.

Monthly usually means once per calendar month, not every 30 days

Read full topic
